attributes.action: Disregard the petition which aims to cancel President Trumps State Visit.
attributes.additional_details:
Allow Donald Trump’s Visit to the UK to go as originally planned.
This man was elected by a Majority vote and as such he is simply carrying out the promises he made as part of his election, good on him.
It is a breath of fresh air to final see someone in power doing the will of the people.
We appreciate that not all approve with his methods but they are part of the Minority and must respect the will of the People.
We need to stop people from throwing their toys out of the pram every time they don’t get what they want.
attributes.background:
